Line 74: Line 74:
After mounting the live CD's filesystem, software on the live CD can be run directly (I.e., without booting) by [[Chroot|chrooting]] into the live CD's mounted filesystem.
After mounting the live CD's filesystem, software on the live CD can be run directly (I.e., without booting) by [[Chroot|chrooting]] into the live CD's mounted filesystem.
â
A live CD ISO image can also be mounted by a [[Virtual Machine]] such as [[VirtualBox]], [[VMware Workstation]] or [[Microsoft Virtual PC]] or can be converted to a [[Live USB]] using [[SYSLINUX]]. Tools such as [[UNetbootin]] can automate this process.
+
A live CD ISO image can also be mounted by a [[Virtual Machine]] such as [[VirtualBox]], [[VMware Workstation]] or can be converted to a [[Live USB]] using [[SYSLINUX]]. Tools such as [[UNetbootin]] can automate this process.
